BR_text.BRsummary: Month dropdown on DateInput is very slow (~5s to appear)
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
 
 Month dropdown on DateInput is very slow (~5s to appear). See <denchmark-link:https://i.imgur.com/WkmHYag.gifv>https://i.imgur.com/WkmHYag.gifv</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
 
 Create st.date_input('hi')
 Click on the date
 Click on the month inside the date
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 Month dropdown should appear almost instantly, with no user-perceived lag.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 Takes ~5 seconds
 <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
 
 Unsure. Does this date input dropdown use our virtualized selectbox?
 <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Streamlit version: develop
 Python version: 3.7.6
 Using Pipenv
 OS version: Windows 10
 Browser version: Chrome

comments_0.comment_text: Simple thing to do would be to change datetime.min to be today-10y by default.
